name: Monero Mining Simulator
description:
a 2d Monero mining simulator ( a private, secure and untraceable fungible crypto currency )

I may work on a 2nd version with 3d assets and much more in depth gameplay in the future.

ALSO PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS EXTREMEL YJANKY AND UNFINISHED BECAUSE I AM HORRIBLE AT MATHS.

disclaimer:  No monero will be mined for real. And there is no save functionality as of yet.
